name: Cheese swirls
ingredients:
1 pkg. puff pastry, 12oz. whipped cream cheese, 5 tbs. sugar, 1.5 tsp. v
e & dark chocolate chips
directions:
Roll out dough - smear on cheese - sprinkle on chips - roll up jelly roll
. Bake 350 20 min.

name: Manicotti
ingredients:
1 lg. onion sauteed, 2 15oz. cans tomato sauce, 1 can water, 2 tsp. lemo
ar
directions: Cook manicotti a little. Mix meat with eggs. Stuff & bake 1 1/2 hours.

name: Meat loaf
ingredients:
1 lb. meat, 1 cup bread crumbs, 1 chopped onion (onion powder), 1 egg, 1
mustard, 2 cans tomato sauce, 3 tbs. vinegar, 3 tbs. brown sugar
directions: Mix pour over meat. Bake at 350 1 hour 15 min.

name: Sweet lukshen kugel
ingredients:
3 eggs, 2 van. sugar, 3/4 cup sugar, 2 tbs, honey, 2 tbs. bread crumbs,
alt, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 bag medium lukshen

name: Squash Quiche
ingredients:
1 egg, 1 Tbs. mayonnaise, 1 stick margarine, 2 Tbs. flour, 1/4 cup mince
to taste, 2 large squash, 1 pie crust
directions:
Cook and strain the squash, bake crust according to package instruction.
 with the squash, pour into crust sprinkle with corn flake crumbs and bake 1-1 1/2 hours on 350
